com.bandyer.android_sdk.call

Interface CallModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BandyerComponent, BandyerModule

    public CallModule
extends BandyerModule

    Module used for audio&video communication.

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCallObserver(CallObserver observer)
      Observe the starting or ending event of a call from an activity. Remember to remove the observer or a leak will occur!

      Observe the starting or ending event of a call from an activity. The observer is automatically disposed when activity is destroyed.
